title: Manufacture of Chemical Fertilizer
decision_details:
considering the joint proposal made by Hon. Piyasena Gamage, Minister 
 
(Senior) for National Resources and Hon. Rishad Bathiudeen, Minister of 
 
Industry and Commerce, Cabinet approval was granted to conduct a 
 
pre-feasibility study by the Ministry of Industry and Commerce in 
 
association with the Ministry of State Resources and Enterprise 
 
Development, in the first instance.
